sig_info: When below 40% of max health, getting struck by a Contact Attack has a 10 to 50% chance to activate Sasquatch’s healing factor, Passively Regenerating 5% of missing health over 20 seconds. Max stacks 3.
During Wrath of Tanaraq, Sasquatch becomes Passively Unstoppable during Special and Heavy Attacks and the Opponent’s Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 10 to 50% when struck by these Attacks.

FROM THE BUSH: A thick fur coat provides 90% Coldsnap resistance along with immunity to Frostbite effects and Armor Break Debuffs.
If Regeneration Rate is inverted, all Regen effects are removed.
Gain +25% Combat Power Rate if the Opponent has a Buff or is suffering from a Stagger Debuff, this is increased to +50% if the Opponent has 4 or more of these effects.
MEDIUM ATTACKS: 30% chance to inflict a Rupture Debuff, dealing 38 Physical Damage over 17 seconds. +70% chance during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPIRIT OF RAGE - MAX STACKS 15: Light Attacks have a 30% chance to build 1 Rage. Chance increased to 100% on the 3rd Light Attack in each combo.
Build 1 Rage every 4.50 seconds that Sasquatch didn’t land a hit.
Each stack of Rage reduces incoming damage from all sources except Special 3 by 5% per stack.
Rage is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction but is prevented while suffering from an Enervate or Exhaustion Debuff.
WRATH OF TANARAQ: If Sasquatch has 5 or more Rage, each stack gained above this threshold has a flat 10% chance to remove all stacks and trigger Wrath of Tanaraq. This lasts for 1.70 seconds per stack removed.
During Wrath of Tanaraq Sasquatch is Stun Immune.
Gain 861.54 Block Penetration and +50% Combat Power Rate.
Special Attack 1 and 2 cost 50% less power and Special Attack 3 costs 25% less Power.
While the Opponent has 3 full Bars of Power, Special and Heavy Attacks will Power Drain 5% of their max Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit refreshes the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs. This can trigger into the Opponent's block.
If the final hit is blocked it has a 20% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds. Chance increased to 100% during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first 2 hits remove the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs, gaining 106.4 Attack Rating for each Rupture removed. This increased by 50% if activated during Wrath of Tanaraq.
The final hit inflicts up to 3 Rupture Debuffs, each dealing 114 Physical Damage over 17 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Passively Regenerate 10% of missing health over 5 seconds. This is increased by a flat +1% per Rage Stack.
Gain up to +5 Stacks of Rage and enter Wrath of Tanaraq. These stacks don’t count toward the Regeneration.

sig_info: When below 40% of max health, getting struck by a Contact Attack has a 10 to 50% chance to activate Sasquatch’s healing factor, Passively Regenerating 5% of missing health over 20 seconds. Max stacks 3.
During Wrath of Tanaraq, Sasquatch becomes Passively Unstoppable during Special and Heavy Attacks and the Opponent’s Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 10 to 50% when struck by these Attacks.

FROM THE BUSH: A thick fur coat provides 90% Coldsnap resistance along with immunity to Frostbite effects and Armor Break Debuffs.
If Regeneration Rate is inverted, all Regen effects are removed.
Gain +25% Combat Power Rate if the Opponent has a Buff or is suffering from a Stagger Debuff, this is increased to +50% if the Opponent has 4 or more of these effects.
MEDIUM ATTACKS: 30% chance to inflict a Rupture Debuff, dealing 50 Physical Damage over 17 seconds. +70% chance during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPIRIT OF RAGE - MAX STACKS 15: Light Attacks have a 30% chance to build 1 Rage. Chance increased to 100% on the 3rd Light Attack in each combo.
Build 1 Rage every 4.50 seconds that Sasquatch didn’t land a hit.
Each stack of Rage reduces incoming damage from all sources except Special 3 by 5% per stack.
Rage is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction but is prevented while suffering from an Enervate or Exhaustion Debuff.
WRATH OF TANARAQ: If Sasquatch has 5 or more Rage, each stack gained above this threshold has a flat 10% chance to remove all stacks and trigger Wrath of Tanaraq. This lasts for 1.70 seconds per stack removed.
During Wrath of Tanaraq Sasquatch is Stun Immune.
Gain 888.46 Block Penetration and +50% Combat Power Rate.
Special Attack 1 and 2 cost 50% less power and Special Attack 3 costs 25% less Power.
While the Opponent has 3 full Bars of Power, Special and Heavy Attacks will Power Drain 5% of their max Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit refreshes the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs. This can trigger into the Opponent's block.
If the final hit is blocked it has a 20% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds. Chance increased to 100% during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first 2 hits remove the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs, gaining 140 Attack Rating for each Rupture removed. This increased by 50% if activated during Wrath of Tanaraq.
The final hit inflicts up to 3 Rupture Debuffs, each dealing 150 Physical Damage over 17 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Passively Regenerate 10% of missing health over 5 seconds. This is increased by a flat +1% per Rage Stack.
Gain up to +5 Stacks of Rage and enter Wrath of Tanaraq. These stacks don’t count toward the Regeneration.

FROM THE BUSH: A thick fur coat provides 90% Coldsnap resistance along with immunity to Frostbite effects and Armor Break Debuffs.
If Regeneration Rate is inverted, all Regen effects are removed.
Gain +25% Combat Power Rate if the Opponent has a Buff or is suffering from a Stagger Debuff, this is increased to +50% if the Opponent has 4 or more of these effects.
MEDIUM ATTACKS: 30% chance to inflict a Rupture Debuff, dealing 316 Physical Damage over 17 seconds. +70% chance during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPIRIT OF RAGE - MAX STACKS 15: Light Attacks have a 30% chance to build 1 Rage. Chance increased to 100% on the 3rd Light Attack in each combo.
Build 1 Rage every 4.50 seconds that Sasquatch didn’t land a hit.
Each stack of Rage reduces incoming damage from all sources except Special 3 by 5% per stack.
Rage is not affected by Ability Accuracy reduction but is prevented while suffering from an Enervate or Exhaustion Debuff.
WRATH OF TANARAQ: If Sasquatch has 5 or more Rage, each stack gained above this threshold has a flat 10% chance to remove all stacks and trigger Wrath of Tanaraq. This lasts for 1.70 seconds per stack removed.
During Wrath of Tanaraq Sasquatch is Stun Immune.
Gain 1023.08 Block Penetration and +50% Combat Power Rate.
Special Attack 1 and 2 cost 50% less power and Special Attack 3 costs 25% less Power.
While the Opponent has 3 full Bars of Power, Special and Heavy Attacks will Power Drain 5% of their max Power.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit refreshes the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs. This can trigger into the Opponent's block.
If the final hit is blocked it has a 20% chance to inflict a Stun Debuff for 3 seconds. Chance increased to 100% during Wrath of Tanaraq.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first 2 hits remove the Opponent's Rupture Debuffs, gaining 884.8 Attack Rating for each Rupture removed. This increased by 50% if activated during Wrath of Tanaraq.
The final hit inflicts up to 3 Rupture Debuffs, each dealing 948 Physical Damage over 17 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Passively Regenerate 10% of missing health over 5 seconds. This is increased by a flat +1% per Rage Stack.
Gain up to +5 Stacks of Rage and enter Wrath of Tanaraq. These stacks don’t count toward the Regeneration.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Passively Regenerate 10% of missing health over 5 seconds. This is increased by a flat +1% per Rage Stack.
